title: Drawing, "Assembly Schematic (for camera), for Minneapolis Honeywell Regulator Co.", October 9, 1959
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower left: PRELIMINARY, lower right: DISPLAY FILE / HENRY DREYFUSS / NEW YORK – 4 WEST 58TH STREET, NEW YORK 19 / CALIFORNIA – 500 COLUMBIA STREET, SOUTH PASADENA / CLIENT MINNEAPOLIS HONEYWELL / REGULATOR COMPANY / TITLE / DATE NUMBER / DISPLAY FILE.
signed: Signed in graphite, lower left: 10/9/59 tl (?).
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left: LENS BARREL LENS REFLECTOR; upper right: BATTERY TRAY / & BACK PANEL; left center: CHASSIS / (PLASTIC); right center: ONE PIECE / HEAD & HANDLE; lower center: END CAP / TRIPOD SOCKET; lower right: Heiland / ASSEMBLY SCHEMATIC / 10/9/59 NONE CS1-3.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Assembly Schematic (for camera), for Minneapolis Honeywell Regulator Co.", October 9, 1959.
October 9, 1959. Graphite on drafting paper/tissue. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-350.
